类 Plot

java.lang.Object
Plot
public class Plot
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the location of the Property objects and the areas they occupy
作者:
Jiaxi Tang

  • 字段概要

    字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    private int depth  
    private int width  
    private int x  
    private int y  

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    Plot()
    no-arg constructor x and y are set to zero depth and width are set to 1
    Plot​(int x, int y, int width, int depth)
    Parameterized constructor
    Plot​(Plot p)
    copy constructor

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Plot

      public Plot()
      no-arg constructor x and y are set to zero depth and width are set to 1

    • Plot

      public Plot​(Plot p)
      copy constructor
      参数:
      p - Plot object

    • Plot

      public Plot​(int x, int y, int width, int depth)
      Parameterized constructor
      参数:
      x - x coordinate of the upper left corner of the property
      y - y coordinate of the upper left corner of the property
      width - width of the property
      depth - length(vertical) of the property

  • 方法详细资料

    • overlaps

      public boolean overlaps​(Plot plot)
      this method determines if this plot overlaps the parameter plot
      参数:
      plot - another plot
      返回:
      true if they overlap, false otherwise

    • encompasses

      public boolean encompasses​(Plot plot)
      this method determines if this plot encompass the parameter plot
      参数:
      plot - plot object
      返回:
      true if the parameter plot is encompassed, false otherwise

    • setX

      public void setX​(int x)
      set x
      参数:
      x - x coordinate of the upper left corner of the property

    • setY

      public void setY​(int y)
      set y
      参数:
      y - y coordinate of the upper left corner of the property

    • setWidth

      public void setWidth​(int width)
      set width
      参数:
      width - width of the plot

    • setDepth

      public void setDepth​(int depth)
      set depth
      参数:
      depth - length(vertical) of the plot

    • getX

      public int getX()
      get x
      返回:
      x coordinate of the upper left corner of the property

    • getY

      public int getY()
      get y
      返回:
      y coordinate of the upper left corner of the property

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      get width
      返回:
      width

    • getDepth

      public int getDepth()
      get depth
      返回:
      length(vertical) of the plot

      toString method
